summary: Implemented Context Transfer component for Lineage
decisions_made: Use JSON for session storage - portable and easy to parse
Patterns are never compressed - they represent hard-won lessons
Git state captures branch, recent commits, and uncommitted files
Handoff includes prioritized next steps, blockers, and questions
patterns_learned: Session IDs should include timestamp for easy sorting
Always capture git state - it provides crucial context
Compression should preserve rationale, not just outcomes
Interactive handoff wizard helps capture structured data

handoff.message: Core transfer system complete, ready for integration
next_steps: Add markdown export for human review
questions: Should sessions auto-compress after N days?
How to handle very large uncommitted file lists?

commits: abc1234 feat: add transfer.sh main CLI
